001package eu.andredick.tools;
002
003import javax.swing.*;
004import java.awt.*;
005import java.awt.event.ComponentAdapter;
006import java.awt.event.ComponentEvent;
007import java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D;
008import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.Random;
011
012/**
013 * 集合与元素的可视化<br>
014 * 每个红色矩形区域表示一个集合,<br>
015 * 图中蓝色点集表示元素集。
016 */
017public class SetGenerator extends JPanel {
018    /**
019     * g_size: 元素个数
020     */
021    private int g_size;
022    /**
023     * t_size: 集合个数
024     */
025    private int t_size;
026    private ArrayList<Point> elements;
027    private ArrayList<Set> sets;
028    private Random rGenerator;
029
030    public SetGenerator(int g_size, int t_size) {
031        super();
032        this.g_size = g_size;
033        this.t_size = t_size;
034        this.elements = new ArrayList<>();
035        this.sets = new ArrayList<>();
036        this.rGenerator = new Random();
037        this.createRandomElements();
038
039        JFrame frame = new JFrame("Draw Line");
040        frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
041        frame.setSize(400, 400);
042        frame.add(this);
043        frame.setVisible(true);
044
045        this.addComponentListener(new ComponentAdapter() {
046            public void componentResized(ComponentEvent e) {
047                // This is only called when the user releases the mouse button.
048                //e.getComponent().repaint();
049            }
050        });
051    }
052
053    public void paintComponent(Graphics g) {
054        Graphics2D g2 = (Graphics2D) g;
055        g2.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING,
056                RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON);
057        g2.setColor(Color.blue);
058        for (Point e : this.elements) {
059            g2.fill(new Ellipse2D.Double((e.x * getWidth()), (e.y * getWidth()), 4, 4));
060        }
061
062        Color color = new Color(1, 0, 0, 0.1f); //Red
063        g2.setPaint(color);
064        for (Set s : this.sets) {
065            g2.draw(new Ellipse2D.Double((s.x * getWidth() - 4), (s.y * getWidth() - 4), 8, 8));
066            g2.fill(new Rectangle2D.Double((s.x - s.dx) * getWidth(), (s.y - s.dy) * getWidth(), s.dx * 2 * getWidth(), s.dy * 2 * getWidth()));
067        }
068    }
069
070    public boolean[][] getRelations() {
071        boolean[][] relations = new boolean[this.g_size][this.t_size];
072
073        for (int i = 0; i < this.elements.size(); i++) {
074            for (int j = 0; j < this.sets.size(); j++) {
075                if (this.sets.get(j).contains(this.elements.get(i))) {
076                    relations[i][j] = true;
077                } else {
078                    relations[i][j] = false;
079                }
080            }
081        }
082
083        return relations;
084    }
085
086    private void createRandomElements() {
087        for (int i = 0; i < this.t_size; i++) {
088            sets.add(new Set(rGenerator.nextFloat(), rGenerator.nextFloat(), rGenerator.nextFloat() / (float) (0.3 * Math.sqrt(t_size)), rGenerator.nextFloat() / (float) (0.3 * Math.sqrt(t_size))));
089        }
090
091        int count_e = 0;
092        while (count_e < g_size) {
093            Point e = new Point(rGenerator.nextFloat(), rGenerator.nextFloat());
094            boolean treffer = false;
095            for (int j = 0; j < sets.size(); j++) {
096                if (sets.get(j).inBounds(e)) {
097                    sets.get(j).add(e);
098                    treffer = true;
099                }
100            }
101            if (treffer) {
102                this.elements.add(e);
103                count_e++;
104            }
105        }
106
107    }
108
109    class Point {
110        float x, y;
111
112        Point(float x, float y) {
113            this.x = x;
114            this.y = y;
115        }
116
117        public float getX() {
118            return this.x;
119        }
120
121        public float getY() {
122            return this.y;
123        }
124
125
126    }
127
128    class Set {
129        float x, y;
130        float dx, dy;
131        /**
132         * 该集合包含的元素
133         */
134        ArrayList<Point> elements;
135
136        Set(float x, float y, float dx, float dy) {
137            this.x = x;
138            this.y = y;
139            this.dx = dx;
140            this.dy = dy;
141            this.elements = new ArrayList<>();
142        }
143
144        public boolean inBounds(Point e) {
145            if (e.x <= (this.x + this.dx) && e.x >= (this.x - this.dx)) {
146                if (e.y <= (this.y + this.dy) && e.y >= (this.y - this.dy)) {
147                    return true;
148                }
149            }
150            return false;
151        }
152
153        public void add(Point e) {
154            this.elements.add(e);
155        }
156
157        public int size() {
158            return this.elements.size();
159        }
160
161        public boolean contains(Point e) {
162            return this.elements.contains(e);
163        }
164    }
165}
